Search.headline: Find your next Dubai story
Search.description: Tell us where you want to wake up and what vibe you’re chasing. We’ll pair sky-high suites, desert adventures, and chef’s tables into one seamless plan.
Search.missingCity: Select a city to start searching.
Search.unsupportedCity: This city is not available in the API yet.

licensed.title: Licensed guides
licensed.copy: Every host is accredited and vetted so you get insider access with total peace of mind.

flexible.title: Flexible changes
flexible.copy: Plans shift. Reschedule most experiences up to 24h before check-in without the drama.

moments.title: Signature moments
moments.copy: From desert dinners to rooftop suites, we curate only the itineraries worth bragging about.

value.title: Transparent value
value.copy: No surprise markups—just premium perks and upgrades negotiated directly with our partners.

Services.title: Book the moments Dubai is famous for.
Services.description: Swap these placeholders with live API results later. Each card comes with an image, rate, and social proof so guests can commit with confidence.

ServiceDetail.bookingCopy: Pick your preferred date and we’ll confirm availability.

Destinations.title: Pick a district, we’ll handle the storytelling.

oldDubai.title: Old Dubai
oldDubai.description: Abra rides, spice souks & Michelin Bib food tours.

palmWestBeach.title: Palm West Beach
palmWestBeach.description: Designer clubs, sunset views, and private cabanas.

abuDhabi.title: Abu Dhabi Daytrip
abuDhabi.description: Falcons, Louvre, and Saadiyat stays in one route.

sasha.quote: 13 Travelro stitched together transfers, restaurants, and a sunrise balloon ride in 48 hours. It felt like our trip had its own showrunner.
sasha.author: Sasha, NYC

rahul.quote: They got us a last-minute table at Tresind Studio and a private yacht with kids’ programming. Nothing felt standard.
rahul.author: Rahul & Aditi, Singapore

daniela.quote: Our concierge used WhatsApp voice notes to tweak the itinerary in real time. Every edit was executed within minutes.
daniela.author: Daniela, Madrid

AuthCTA.title: Unlock concierge-only rates & waitlist access.
AuthCTA.description: Create an account or log in to sync saved itineraries, manage payments, and chat with a travel designer in minutes.
AuthCTA.disclaimer: By continuing, you agree to curated emails and our privacy policy.

Footer.title: Ultra-tailored itineraries since 2013.
Footer.description: We obsess over every transfer, tasting menu, and turndown so you don’t have to. Swap this copy with your own story when you’re ready.
